metadata.title: ewinever Handheld Natural Jade Muscle Roller Stick massager Trigger Point Body Massage Tool,Back,Neck Shoulder,Leg Massager,Relieve Pain and stress
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "4.17 x 3.54 x 1.97 inches; 3.52 Ounces", "Manufacturer": "EWIN24"}

categorization.explanation: The product is a handheld body massager made from natural jade, which is used for relieving pain and stress. It fits well under the 'Beauty & Personal Care' category, specifically under 'Skin Care' and then 'Body' as it is used on various parts of the body.
